history.text: Hello!
Hello. The movie we will be talking about is called The Notebook.
Oh how interesting!
What is the movie about?
This movie has Ryan Gosling and Rachel McAdams as main actors. They are known for their good acting skills.
Yes I like them both! What are the ratings for this movie?
The movie is about a young couple in the 1940s who fall in love.
The ratings are 52% on Rotten Tomatoes and a metacritic score of 53/100.

Ok, No the highest ratings. I what part of the country 
does this take place?
They are not the highest ratings, so it might not be a good movie to watch. This is an American film.
What state does this take place in?
What time of year does it take place in?
This takes place in South Carolina. The main character, Noah falls in love with a 17 year old heiress named Allie. They have a summer love affair.

How romantic! Do they continue their relationship after summer or do the end their relationship! Is there tragedy
 in the movie?
Allie is prevented by her parents from seeing Noah further. The two get in an argument and break up.
How sad! There must be a twist in the movie??
What was the reason that the parents would not let them see each other?

Allie's family ends up moving to Charleston. Allie's parents call Noah trash. Overall the critics say the movie is good for people craving over-the-top romance. It does have rather low ratings overall though.
I see! There must have been some type of "class" difference. Or was it that Noah was truly "trash"?
How long is the movie?
I'm not sure. I do know though that Noah wrote letters to Allie daily for a year but Allie's mother intercepted them. Noah enlists in WWII and Allie becomes engaged to another man.

Oh how sad! Wh
o directs the movie?

Nick Cassavetes. This movie is actually based on the 1996 novel The Notebook by Nicholas Sparks. The story is narrated from present day by an elderly man telling the tale to a fellow nursing home resident.
Do you agree with the rating of the movie?
How interesting! So it is movie that is shot in third person narrative??
It sound like the rating of the movie is rather low and I could understand. It sound like the movie is very slow!
Maybe you can look that up online. The rating is rather low, but critics do say the main actors are suitably attractive and appealing.
From what you have read, would you go see the movie?
There are low ratings yet positive reviews from critics. I think I would give it a shot. What about you?
From what you have written I would probably go see the movie. Did the paragraphs indicate when the movie was filmed?
The movie was filmed 2004. Do you generally like romance movies?
Yes to a degree! If they are to slow and "sappy" I will get bored! How about you? do you like romance movies?
I agree. I like romance movies as long as they keep moving and aren't too over-the-top.
I need to get back to work! It was nice chatting with you!!!

uid1response.feedback: I am truly not sure if I would go to see this movie. As I was mentioning to the other person, I like these types of movies but if they are to slow I get bored!
